amendatorysection.catchline: Board members; appointment procedures; Director of Agriculture and board; duties.
amendatorysection.para: (1) The Director of Agriculture shall be responsible for the procedures involved in appointing the initial board. The director shall prescribe all necessary forms for registering candidacy and adopt rules and regulations to carry out his or her responsibility under this section.
(2) The board shall be responsible for the administration of all subsequent appointments and may adopt rules and regulations to carry out such responsibility.
